mapper.insert: insert into tpps_acom(arno, ano, arwriter, arcontent) values(tpps_acom_seq.nextval, #{ano}, #{arwriter}, #{arcontent})
mapper.update: update tpps_acom set arwriter = #{arwriter}, arcontent = #{arcontent} where arno = #{arno} and ano = #{ano}
mapper.delete: delete from tpps_acom where arno = #{arno} and bno = ${ano}
mapper.select: select arno, ano, arwriter, arcontent, ardate from tpps_acom where ano = #{ano} and arno = #{arno}
